channel.title: Creek Oxley Management Insights
channel.description: Strategic insights, operational excellence, and industry expertise from Creek Oxley's consulting team.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025 Creek Oxley Management Consultant. All rights reserved.

item.title: From Nairobi to Kigali: 5 Management Consulting Pillars for Mastering Cross-Border Operations in the EAC
item.description: Learn the five essential management consulting pillars for successful cross-border operations across East Africa. From strategic alignment to data-driven growth, master regional expansion in the EAC.
item.author: info@creekoxley.com (Creek Oxley Team)

item.title: Stop Missing Out: The Cost of Ignoring Global Exhibitions
item.description: Don't let logistics fears hold you back from global exhibitions. Learn how DMCs can transform your international trade show strategy and why your competitors are already there.
item.author: info@creekoxley.com (Creek Oxley Team)

item.title: The Remarkable Turnaround of Adidas: A Management Masterclass
item.description: In 2022, Adidas was dragged into its biggest crisis in decades through no fault of its own. Learn how decisive management actions turned a €58 million loss into a €1.34 billion profit and a 48% stock price increase.
item.author: info@creekoxley.com (Creek Oxley Team)

item.title: Resolving Management Problems: Why Leadership Conflicts Can Break — or Build — Your Business
item.description: At some point in nearly every company's journey, complex management problems emerge. Conflicting visions, leadership deadlocks, or operational growing pains can threaten even the strongest founding teams.
item.author: info@creekoxley.com (Creek Oxley Team)

item.title: Choosing Between a Business Name, LLP and Company Formation in Kenya
item.description: Starting a business in Kenya isn't just about the idea or the market — it's also about structure. The choice between registering a Business Name, setting up a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), or incorporating a Private Limited Company can have lasting consequences.
item.author: info@creekoxley.com (Creek Oxley Team)
